Application Gateway

Build secure, scalable, and highly available web front ends in Azure

1RMB Trial Buy Now

By providing HTTP load balancing and delivery control, Azure Application Gateway permits you to build highly scalable and highly available websites.

Pricing Details

Application Gateway

We charge for Application Gateway based on the settings and the quantity of time providing the gateway, as well as the amount of data processed by Application Gateway.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimation is based on a usage of 744 hours every month.

* When using multiple instances, you are charged per instance.
Application Gateway Types Basic Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) Application Gateway
Small ￥0.16 per gateway/instance/hour (about ￥119.04/month) Not available
Medium ￥0.45 per gateway/instance/hour (about ￥334.80/month) ￥1.80 per gateway/instance/hour (about ￥1,339.20/month)
Large ￥2.01 per gateway/instance/hour (about ￥1,495.44/month) ￥6.38 per gateway/instance/hour (about ￥4,746.72/month)

Data processing

The charges for data processing are based on the amount of data processed by the Application Gateway.

*The following prices are tax-inclusive.

*Monthly price estimates are based on 744 hours of usage per month.
Data processing Small Medium Large
First 10 TB/month ￥0.05/GB Free Free
Last 30TB (10 - 40 TB)/month ￥0.05/GB ￥0.04/GB Free
Over 40 TB/month ￥0.05/GB ￥0.04/GB ￥0.02/GB

Inbound data transfers

(Namely, data transmission into the Azure Datacenter): data transmitted into the Azure Datacenter via Application Gateway will be charged at the standard Data Transmission Rate.

Outbound data transfers

(Namely, data transmission from Azure Datacenter): data transmitted from Azure Datacenter via Application Gateway will be charged at the standard Data Transmission Rate.

FAQ

Expand all
  • Will usage of less than one hour be billed as one hour?

    Yes, usage of less than one hour will be billed as one hour.

  • Is a Service Level Agreement offered for an application cloud service with only one instance? What about small application gateways?

    No. The small-sized Application Gateway is mainly used for development/testing purposes. Running production workloads on a small-sized Application Gateway may exceed the capacity of small instances. Application Gateway supports deploying one or several instances in the same cloud service. Due to a lack of high availability, running the Application Gateway service with only one instance is not recommended.

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other method to contact us for support.

We guarantee every Application Gateway service with two or more medium- and large-sized instances is available at least 99.9% of the time. We don’t provide service level agreements for Application Gateway service with only one instance or small instances. If you want to learn about the details of our server level agreement, please access the Service Level Agreement page.

Using Azure Application Gateway enables you to build highly scalable and available websites by providing HTTP load balancing and delivery control. We charge for application gateways based on their settings and the amount of time that they are available, as well as the amount of data that they process. We also offer different pricing for small, medium and large types. A 1RMB Trial gets you ￥1,500 in service credits.
